A-dynamic-jitter-buffer.label: Dynamic Jitter Buffers
A-dynamic-jitter-buffer.help: Dynamically buffer client audio based on perceived jitter in packet receipt timing

B-desired-jitter-buffer-frames.label: Desired Jitter Buffer Frames
B-desired-jitter-buffer-frames.help: If dynamic jitter buffers is disabled, this determines the target number of frames maintained by the AudioMixer's jitter buffers

C-max-frames-over-desired.label: Max Frames Over Desired
C-max-frames-over-desired.help: The highest number of frames an AudioMixer's ringbuffer can exceed the desired jitter buffer frames by

D-unattenuated-zone.label: Unattenuated Zone
D-unattenuated-zone.help: Boxes for source and listener (corner x, corner y, corner z, size x, size y, size z, corner x, corner y, corner z, size x, size y, size z)
